Description: Green glazed steatite heart-scarab with jasper and blue glass inlays on the back; pierced transversely.
Curator's comments: Published: Andrews, Amulets of Ancient Egypt (1994): fig.44
Bibliographic references: Shaw & Nicholson 1995 / British Museum Dictionary of Ancient Egypt (p123)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Capt Edward G Spencer-Churchill (Trustees of)
